pr_title: fix: allow game to quit without waiting for registry updater thread

timeline.message:
AdvancedGameSetupScreen: this thread should not prevent the app from exiting

set it to daemon-mode and give it a name for easier troubleshooting.

timeline.bodyText: "ModuleRegistryUpdater"  sounds better and more ralate then "AdvancedGameSetupScreen"
